author: rdonkin
msg: Added DTD from main branch. Also renamed todo.xml to tasks.xml (so that it's compatible with maven). Also updated release notes.
This commit was manufactured by cvs2svn to create branch

author: rdonkin
msg: Added validity check for element and attribute names in .betwixt files. Only certain names are allowed by the XML specification. Now when the name specified in a .betwixt will be checked to make sure it complied with these rules.

author: rdonkin
msg: Moved utility methods into XMLUtils. Deprecated methods that were moved.
